ro_node.tpch_query: select c_custkey, c_name, l_extendedprice, l_discount, c_acctbal, n_name, c_address, c_phone, c_comment from customer, orders, lineitem, nation where c_custkey = o_custkey and l_orderkey = o_orderkey and c_nationkey >= 1 and c_nationkey <= 25 and o_orderdate >= '1993-10-01'  and o_orderdate < '1994-01-01' and l_shipdate >= '1992-01-01' and l_shipdate < '1993-03-01' and c_nationkey = n_nationkey order by n_name desc;
